description.value:
Favored Weapons @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Longsword], @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-srd.Item.Whip]

Members of the Order of the Rack seek to eliminate wastefulness throughout the Inner Sea region. They seek to quash pointless dreams, quell rebellions, and destroy dangerous inventions.

Lesser Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Disillusionment]

Greater Benefit @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Silence Heresy]
